### Welcome to My GitHub Page.
When an eagleâ€™s spirit awakens in youthful hearts,It sees its luminous goal beyond the starry heavens.

### Who
May Peace and blessings of All-mighty be on you, this is Aameer Rafiq Wani, I grew up in Kashmir, India. Currently I am working in Hyderabad, India.I Have completed my bachelors in Computer Science.

### What
I love Programming and Augmented Reality.I love to learn and innovate new things.I have been part of some interesting projects and am working in a start-up.

### Why?
I am trying to contribute to open source community and will be sharing some interesting things here.
```
$ Programming
$ technology
$ frustration
```

### Thank God you are not bored to death, so I hope you will keep testing you patience with me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
